Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone!

My gaming team and I have been putting together video tutorials and let's plays for awhile for this and other games. The link below will take you to our site where we upload new video tutorials. So far we have Advanced Maneuvers, Mun landing/orbiting, and docking/rendezvous. We are open to suggestion on other videos. Some of the upcoming videos include spaceplane creation, spaceplane flight/aerodynamics, and space station creation/usefulness. There will be others but that's just a short list of what's to come.

http://sinsgaming.altervista.org/tutorials.html

Come check us out!

Thanks,

Sloth
